content: **tortellini the tortoise - african flower tortoise** **you will need ** roughly 25-30g of yarn in at least two colours plus a small amount of red yarn safety eyes recommended 7mm 2 5mm hook you can use any hook size that works with your chosen yarn but this will impact the size of the project i used 2 5mm with dk yarn polyfill / stuffing a needle and thread/ fabric glue optional available free with pdf download if you enjoyed this pattern and would like to donate to the creator you can do so via kofi https //ko-fi com/catherinem *pattern based on granny square tortoise by brigitte read*
